alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Gaines; Lower Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 18 at 2:19AM CST until January 18 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY AROUND 15%, 20FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR GREATER, AND VERY HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR THE PERMIAN BASIN, LOWER TRANS PECOS AND BIG BEND REGION... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY AS LOW AS 12%, 20FT WINDS OF 20 MPH OR GREATER, AND VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR PORTIONS OF THE PERMIAN BASIN AND BIG BEND REGION... * AFFECTED AREA...Gaines, Andrews, Central Brewster County, Chisos Basin and Lower Brewster County. * TIMING...This afternoon through early this evening. * WINDS...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * RFTI...4 or near critical to 5 or critical. * IMPACTS...Avoid the use of open flames or any activities that may generate sparks. Accidental ignitions may have the potential to grow into dangerous wind-driven wildfires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures will increase potential for fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Andrews; Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Gaines; Lower Brewster County
